Package clientGUIControllers

Class ActivateSalesController

java.lang.Object
clientGUIControllers.ActivateSalesController
public class ActivateSalesController extends Object
This class gives the option to Marketing Manger to ask from the Marketing Worker to active one of the sale pattern. He also can view all current sale patterns He can choose which sale pattern he want to active. He can choose the dates the sale will be. This department makes use of the tables: * 'SalesPatterns', where we will show the current sale patten and choose one of them. * 'Sales', where we will add the requests for the marketing worker. Â
